channel.title: How do i upload pics and post them on a Moparscape topic?
channel.description:
Ive tried an uploader, but it post's wrong... Here it is, i don't know how to upload... Do i have to resize it? Here is what i tried
[URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img156.imageshack.us/img156/4448/masterxy3.png[/img][/URL]

ok not to make it where u fdont have to click it to look you have the 3 things under the picture on the photobucket click on img code and past it on and u will have your pic with out going to click on it

item.title: How do i upload pics and post them on a Moparscape topic?
item.dc:creator: @Tico135 Tico
item.description:
@Tico135 wrote:

By the way, it looks like you can already do it… Press PrntSc on your keyboard and paste it in a topic. Please read other topics and stickies to see if your question can be answered WITHOUT making a post.

Thanks,

Tico135

item.title: How do i upload pics and post them on a Moparscape topic?
item.dc:creator: @ModatorScape ModatorScape
item.description:
@ModatorScape wrote:

Just go To
www.photobucket.com ------>Make an Account----->Go To Your Album----->Upload Your Pictures-------->Scrol Down------->Copy The Thing Next to “IMG Code” Its Going to Start Like This [IMG]http://i157.photobucket.com/ -------> Copy That And Paste it On The Forums
